alert.note: Alert for Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 4:11AM EDT until April 19 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 35 will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, east winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to around 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 8 AM EDT this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 6 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
